NewsItem.HEADLINE: Expert Insight for RAN Subscribers: ORAN Opportunities are Opening Up
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Clear guidance on how ORAN will change both outdoor and indoor wireless networks.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report provides a strategic view of why ORAN is not expected to be a major disruption in mobile, outdoor networksâ€¦but why alternative vendors with ORAN products may gain a foothold in the in-building market.
